response.overview: “Old Video” was assembled from a pieces of the non existing film was shot in  Crimea at the beginning of the century. Bluish, faded colors is a nostalgia refer  to old color TV or a tombstone print. The viewers are peeping into a  supernatural wonderland, absolutely unreachable, as an afterlife.  In his essay for “Old video” artist Pavel Peppershtain, states that space and  time in the film is a chronotype for a bliss. He is questioning: how and why are  the territories of happiness appear are disappear?
response.title: Old Video
